    • createTeenagerFromCsvRow

      private Teenager createTeenagerFromCsvRow(String rowContent, Map<String,Integer> csvStructure, Map<Integer,List<String>> criterionLogMessages, int currentRowNumber) throws CsvRowInvalidStructureException, TeenagerAttributeException
      Create a Teenager Object from a csv splitted row.
      Parameters:
      rowContent - a String representing a csv row.
      csvStructure - a HashMap<String,Integer> representating the csv structure.
      criterionLogMessages - a Map<Integer, List<String>> representating the current log messages.
      currentRowNumber - a int representating the csv current row number.
      Returns:
      a Teenager instantiated object.
      Throws:
      CsvRowInvalidStructureException
      TeenagerAttributeException

    • importFromCsv

      public HashMap<CountryName,ArrayList<Teenager>> importFromCsv(File csvFile, boolean generateLogFile) throws Exception
      Import teenagers from a .csv file
      Parameters:
      csvFile - a File representing the file to import.
      generateLogFile - a boolean to know if the controller has to generate log files.
      Returns:
      a list of teenager grouped by country as HashMap<CountryName,ArrayList<Teenager>>.
      Throws:
      CsvRowInvalidStructureException - Exception
      Exception
